snippet: Michael G. Grimm, who is seeking a second term, has drawn Tea Party criticism and allegations of fund-raising improprieties.
abstract: Rep Michael G Grimm, Republican of New York who is seeking a second term, is working hard to fend off allegations of improper or even illegal campaign fund-raising; Grimm, who represents a swing district covering Staten Island and part of Brooklyn, is popular among red-state Republicans, but has been criticized by Tea Party conservatives for his centrist voting record, feeding view of Democrats that he is vulnerable.
lead_paragraph: Michael G. Grimm, who is seeking a second term, has drawn Tea Party criticism and allegations of fund-raising improprieties.

headline.seo: Michael Grimm, G.O.P. Congressman, Fights Critics
headline.main: Rising G.O.P. Star From Staten Island Draws on Political Gifts to Fend Off Critics
headline.print_headline: Rising G.O.P. Star From Staten Island Draws on Political Gifts to Fend Off Critics
